titles.title: Gambling Impact Study Commission Act
A bill to establish the Gambling Impact Study Commission.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16474)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 11/19/1993--Introduced. Gambling Impact Study Commission Act - Establishes the Gambling Impact Study Commission to study all matters relating to the impact of gambling on States, political subdivisions of States, and Native American tribes for a report to the Congress and the President. Authorizes appropriations.
